description: It showcases the world-famous and lesser-known national parks so that viewers can discover the diversity and wonder of the United States.
name: America's National Parks

review.name: Absolutely gorgeous and well made...but will there be more?
review.reviewBody: Recently, five wonderful episodes of this series were released to the Disney Channel and it sure left me wanting more. Much of it is because I have only visited two of the five parks and I enjoyed watching the other three to plan some upcoming trips. Why did I enjoy it so much? Well, the cinematography is insanely good....among the best you'll find in any nature documentary...about on par with the "Planet Earth" series. I loved how the show really emphasized the animals you might encounter in the parks. I also was surprised at how good Garth Brooks' voice was, as I just didn't expect him to sound so professorial! Well worth seeing and at times breathtaking.
